io.atomix.catalyst.buffer.util

Interface Memory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectMemory, HeapMemory, MappedMemory, NativeMemory

    public interface Memory
    Memory allocator.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Memory.Util
      Memory utilities.

    • Method Summary

      long address()
      Returns the memory address.

      Returns the memory address for the given offset.
